ChatGPT Chat Hider

A simple and efficient Chrome extension that helps you manage your ChatGPT conversation list by allowing you to hide and unhide chats. Click "X" button that shows up left of the regarding chat. 

Features
- Hide any chat with a single click using the X button next to each conversation
- Access hidden chats easily through the extension popup
- Restore hidden chats whenever you need them
- Maintains hidden state even after page refresh
- Works seamlessly with ChatGPT's interface
- No data sent to external servers - all data stored locally

How to Use
1. Click the X button next to any chat to hide it
2. Click the extension icon to see your hidden chats
3. Click "Show" on any hidden chat to make it visible again

Privacy
- All data is stored locally in your browser
- No external servers or data collection
- Your chat list preferences remain private

Technical Details
- Works with ChatGPT web interface
- Lightweight and performance-friendly
- No impact on ChatGPT's core functionality
